1   package org.kohsuke.args4j.util;
2   
3   import java.lang.reflect.Field;
4   import java.util.ArrayList;
5   import java.util.List;
6   
7   import org.kohsuke.args4j.Option;
8   import org.kohsuke.args4j.ProxyOptionHandler;
9   import org.kohsuke.args4j.spi.Getter;
10  import org.kohsuke.args4j.spi.Getters;
11  import org.openimaj.util.pair.IndependentPair;
12  
13  /**
14   * @author Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
15   */
16  public class ArgsUtil {
17  
18  	private ArgsUtil() {
19  	}
20  
21  	/**
22  	 * @param bean
23  	 * @return return the Args4j options which would result in the current bean
24  	 * @throws Exception
25  	 */
26  	public static String[] extractArguments(Object bean) throws Exception {
27  		List<Getter<?>> arguments = null;
28  		arguments = parse(bean);
29  		List<String> args = new ArrayList<String>();
30  		for (Getter<?> optionHandler : arguments) {
31  			List<IndependentPair<String, Class<?>>> values = optionHandler.getStringValues();
32  			for (IndependentPair<String, Class<?>> object : values) {
33  				if(object.secondObject() == Boolean.class){
34  					if(object.firstObject() == null){
35  						continue;
36  					}
37  					else{
38  						args.add(optionHandler.getOptionName());
39  					}
40  				}
41  				else{					
42  					args.add(optionHandler.getOptionName());
43  					args.add(object.firstObject());
44  				}
45  			}
46  		}
47  		return args.toArray(new String[args.size()]);
48  	}
49  
50  	private static List<Getter<?>> parse(Object bean) throws SecurityException, NoSuchFieldException, IllegalArgumentException, IllegalAccessException {
51  		ArrayList<Getter<?>> options = new ArrayList<Getter<?>>();
52  		// recursively process all the methods/fields.
53  		for (Class<?> c = bean.getClass(); c != null; c = c.getSuperclass()) {
54  
55  			for (Field f : c.getDeclaredFields()) {
56  				Option o = f.getAnnotation(Option.class);
57  				if (o != null) {
58  					options.add(Getters.create(o.name(),f, bean));
59  					if (o.handler() == ProxyOptionHandler.class) {
60  						Field opField = c.getDeclaredField(f.getName() + "Op");
61  						Object opBean = null;
62  						try{
63  							opBean = opField.get(bean);							
64  						}
65  						catch (Exception e) {
66  							opField.setAccessible(true);
67  							opBean = opField.get(bean);
68  							
69  						}
70  						options.addAll(parse(opBean));
71  					}
72  				}
73  			}
74  		}
75  		return options;
76  	}
77  }
